org.simulationsystems.csf.common.internal.messaging.xml.transformers

Class FrameworkMessageDocumentHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.simulationsystems.csf.common.internal.messaging.xml.transformers.FrameworkMessageDocumentHelper

  • public class FrameworkMessageDocumentHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    The helper class for the FrameworkMessageImpl implementation of the FrameworkMessage interface wrapping the CsfMessageExchange XML Document
    Since:
    0.1
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Jorge Calderon

    • Method Detail

      • addDistributedAutonomousAgent

        public org.jdom2.Document addDistributedAutonomousAgent(org.jdom2.Document doc,
                                               org.jdom2.Element distributedAutononomousAgentElement,
                                               boolean removeChildren)
        Adds the distributed autonomous agent to a CsfMessageExchange Document. Side effect includes detaching the distributedAutononomousAgentElement from the current Document. Generally you would no longer need to use the original Document. If you do need to still use the original Document, it is best to clone the distributed autonomous agent element prior to calling this method.
        Parameters:
        doc - the doc
        distributedAutononomousAgentElement - the distributed autononomous agent element
        removeChildren - the remove children
        Returns:
        the document

      • getNextAgentModelActor

        public org.jdom2.Element getNextAgentModelActor(java.lang.Object distributedAutonomousAgent,
                                       org.jdom2.Element cachedAgentModelTemplate)
        Gets the next agent model actor in the distributed autonomous agent element. If the cachedAgentModelTemplate is null, it get the first element and returns it. Otherwise, it creates a new element and returns it.
        Parameters:
        distributedAutonomousAgent - the distributed autononomous agent
        cachedAgentModelTemplate - the cached agent model template
        Returns:
        the next agent model actor

      • getNextDistributedAutonomousAgent

        public org.jdom2.Element getNextDistributedAutonomousAgent(java.lang.Object doc,
                                                  org.jdom2.Element cachedDistributedAutonomousAgentTemplate)
        Gets the next distributed autonomous agent. If the cachedDistributedAutonomousAgentTemplate is null, it get the first element and returns it. Otherwise, it creates a new element and returns it.
        Parameters:
        doc - the doc
        cachedDistributedAutonomousAgentTemplate - the cached distributed autonomous agent template
        Returns:
        the next distributed autonomous agent

      • getSelfLocationFromNextDistributedAutonomousAgentNextAgentModelActor

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getSelfLocationFromNextDistributedAutonomousAgentNextAgentModelActor(FrameworkMessage msg)
        Gets the actor's own location element in the simulation-specific section for the next agent model actor in the next distributed autonomous agent. The actor's own location is in the CommonEnvironmentChanges section.
        Parameters:
        msg - the msg
        Returns:
        the self location
